mapper.insert: INSERT INTO msg( msg_sender, msg_receiver, msg_title, msg_content, file_name ) VALUES( #{sender}, #{receiver}, #{msgTitle}, #{msgContent}, #{msgFileName} )
mapper.update: UPDATE msg SET msg_receive_del_status = CASE WHEN msg_receiver = #{empCode} THEN CASE WHEN #{request} = 1 THEN 'Y' WHEN #{request} = 2 THEN 'N' WHEN #{request} = 3 THEN 'D' ELSE msg_receive_del_status END ELSE msg_receive_del_status END, msg_send_del_status = CASE WHEN msg_sender = #{empCode} THEN CASE WHEN #{request} = 1 THEN 'Y' WHEN #{request} = 2 THEN 'N' WHEN #{request} = 3 THEN 'D' ELSE msg_send_del_status END ELSE msg_send_del_status END WHERE msg_num = #{msgNum} AND (msg_receiver = #{empCode} OR msg_sender = #{empCode})
mapper.select: SELECT m.msg_num msgNum, m.msg_sender sender, se.emp_kor_name senderName, m.msg_receiver receiver, re.emp_kor_name receiverName, m.msg_title msgTitle, m.file_name msgFileName, f.original_file_name msgOriginalFileName, m.msg_content msgContent, DATE_FORMAT(m.msg_send_time, '%y/%m/%d %H시%i분') AS sendTime, DATE_FORMAT(m.msg_read_time, '%y/%m/%d %H시%i분') AS readTime FROM msg m JOIN emp re ON m.msg_receiver = re.emp_code JOIN emp se ON m.msg_sender = se.emp_code LEFT JOIN msg_file f ON m.file_name = f.file_name WHERE m.msg_num = #{msgNum}
